<div>   
<p>京东自营苹果夏季大促，<a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone 12</a>/12 mini 领券立减 800 元，<a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone</a> 12 Pro（Max）领券减 400 元，<a class="s_tag" href="https://iphone.ithome.com/" target="_blank">iPhone 11</a> 系列领券立减 350 元，<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank"
